Text:
thank you so much

I tried converting an mkv with srt subs and they would not sync

your releases are top quality no hassle
Would appreciate any additional feedback on quality as I think 700 mb would be more suited for a 1.5 hour runtime show. Will adjust settings for future episodes if required...

Thanks, Snowhiter!  Appreciated!

Quality is good, but I think it would be better as 700 mb for a show this length, as you mentioned.
Quality good, but, as mentioned, would be better at 700MB for this length.
Next and all further Episodes will be at least 700mb's - thanx for the feedback ;)
Would love more episodes of Braquo season 2 :)
